[i]Helswath[/i] – Whenever Lombard, Divine Axe enters or attacks, forge, then you may attach target equipment to up to one target creature you control.
[i]Pavise[/i] – Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, roll a d6. If the result is 5 or greater, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn.
